amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Defense to maintain a website listing information on Federal contractor misconduct, and to require a report on Federal sole source contracts related to Iraq reconstruction.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2533 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2533 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12781) To require the Secretary of Defense to maintain a website listing information on Federal contractor misconduct, and to require a report on Federal sole source contracts related to Iraq reconstruction.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2533 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2533 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lautenberg.
